name: Camie® 313B Fast Tack Upholstery Adhesive - Bulk
description: Camie® 313B Fast Tack Upholstery Adhesive - Bulk is formulated for use in the foam and fabric trade for a quick tack, strong bond and a soft glue line. It works well to affix urethane foam, fabric and paper to themselves or to metal, wood, etc. Camie® 313B can be used with either the 118 SPRAY GUN or conventional air operated equipment.
